name: Hot Pot-ato
description:
A local multiplayer game where you take turns adding the right ingredients into the pot to complete the recipe. The longer you hold the pot, the more damage you take so time is key!

Player One Controls:

Movement: WASD keys

Pick up:  Left Shift

Throw: F key

Player Two Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys

Pick up:  Right Shift

Throw: / key
